description: Warm-up. Easy spinning to get the blood flowing.
Further increase cadence and resistance. Prepare for Threshold intervals.
Threshold Interval 1. Maintain a sustainable but challenging pace, just below your lactate threshold. Focus on smooth pedal strokes.
Recovery spin. Lower cadence and resistance to allow for partial recovery.
Threshold Interval 2. Same intensity as Interval 1. Maintain focus and power.
Threshold Interval 3. Don't lose focus. Maintain Threshold Power.
Threshold Interval 4. Same intensity as Interval 1. Maintain focus and power.
Threshold Interval 5. Don't lose focus. Maintain Threshold Power.
Threshold Interval 6. Same intensity as Interval 1. Maintain focus and power.
Threshold Interval 7. Don't lose focus. Maintain Threshold Power.
Cool-down. Easy spinning to gradually reduce intensity.
